Class Checked.OptionalChar

java.lang.Object
org.postgresql.pljava.internal.Checked.OptionalBase
org.postgresql.pljava.internal.Checked.OptionalChar
Enclosing interface:
Checked<WT,​EX extends Throwable>
public static class Checked.OptionalChar
extends Checked.OptionalBase
A container object which may or may not contain a char value.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static Checked.OptionalChar EMPTY
    An empty OptionalChar, for convenience; not to be used in identity-sensitive operations.
